alert.note: Alert for Berkeley; Jefferson; Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:27PM EDT until June 22 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Frederick County in northwestern Virginia... Northern Clarke County in northwestern Virginia... The City of Winchester in northwestern Virginia... Southwestern Jefferson County in the Panhandle of West Virginia... South central Morgan County in the Panhandle of West Virginia... Southwestern Berkeley County in the Panhandle of West Virginia... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 427 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Inwood, or near Greenwood, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Winchester, Millwood Pike, Berryville, Inwood, Cedar Grove, Gaylord, Clear Brook, Ridgeway, Bunker Hill, Oakland, Stephenson, Cedar Hill, Albin, Unger, Stringtown, Brucetown, Glengary, Omps, Greenwood and Shanghai. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
